oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Is the isoscalar monopole resonance of the $\alpha$-particle a collective mode?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Orlandini, G.
Bacca, S.
Barnea, N.
Leidemann, W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nuclear Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this contribution we review and clarify the arguments which might allow the interpretation of the isoscalar monopole resonance of $^4$He as a collective breathing mode.
Comment: 5 pages, 3 figures, Proceedings of the 21st international conference on Few-Body Problems in Physics, May 18-22,2015, Chicago (USA)
